messages.messageBody:
--- keiman0 <KeimanZero@...> wrote:

> Gomen for asking about the differences between
> seppuku and h-k. I
> went to Samurai-Archives.com and searched there. I
> found out the
> answer. But you guys and gals already know it eh?
> Arigato for your
> time. See ya soon-K&K

Not a dumb question, but it had JUST been discussed.
It was like a scene out of some teen movie:

Board:
"Hara Kiri and Seppuku are different. Here's why:..."

You:
"Hey, are hara-kiri and seppuku different? how?"

99% of questions aren't dumb--if you don't know, how
are you going to find out if you don't ask? But next
time, please just go to the message list in the Yahoo
group and read what's been posted, so we don't repeat
the same messages 3 times.


Thanks,

The assistant management

messages.messageBody:
Gomen for asking about the differences between seppuku and h-k. I
went to Samurai-Archives.com and searched there. I found out the
answer. But you guys and gals already know it eh? Arigato for your
time. See ya soon-K&K
